sentences.en: A united effort is always more effective than an isolated complaint.
sentences.cn: 联合行动总是比单个人抱怨更有效。

sentences.en: As a boy he was a Manchester United fan.
sentences.cn: 小时候，他是曼联队的球迷。

sentences.en: Dundee United's Dave Bowman makes his international debut.
sentences.cn: 邓迪联队的戴夫·鲍曼首次亮相国际比赛。

sentences.en: I scrolled down to find "United States of America".
sentences.cn: 我向下滚动文档搜索“美利坚合众国”。

sentences.en: Kernaghan missed the United game after he ricked his neck.
sentences.cn: 克纳汉因为扭伤脖子而错过了联赛。

sentences.en: Manchester United hung on to take the Cup.
sentences.cn: 曼联队坚持到了最后，夺得了足总杯的冠军。

sentences.en: Manchester United were by now oozing with confidence.
sentences.cn: 曼彻斯特联队现在充满信心。

sentences.en: Oxford United have transfer-listed two midfield players.
sentences.cn: 牛津联足球俱乐部已把两名中场球员列入转会名单。

sentences.en: The two countries were united against a common enemy.
sentences.cn: 这两个国家联合起来对付共同的敌人。

sentences.en: The United manager was to be seen frantically signalling to McClair.
sentences.cn: 一会儿可以看到曼联主教练拼命地朝麦克莱尔示意。

sentences.en: They conceded four goals to Leeds United.
sentences.cn: 他们被利兹联队攻进4个球。

sentences.en: This television program provoked a spirited debate in the United Kingdom.
sentences.cn: 这个电视节目在英国引起了激烈的辩论。

sentences.en: United are still my tip for the Title.
sentences.cn: 我仍然认定联队会夺冠。

sentences.en: United left the pitch looking stunned and drained.
sentences.cn: 曼联队离开球场时看上去备受打击，身心俱疲。

sentences.en: United should be thinking in terms of winning the European Cup.
sentences.cn: 联队应该在考虑要赢得欧洲杯。

words.tran_cn: 团结一致地；联合在一起地
使团结；使联合；使结婚（unite的现在分词）
一致的，统一的；团结的，和睦的

phrases.tran_cn: 曼彻斯特联队（简称曼联）
联合航空公司（美国一家航空公司）
统一战线，统战；联合阵线，联合作战
联合科技（财富500强公司之一，总部所在地美国，主要经营航空航天）

trans.tran_en: joined or closely connected by feelings, aims etc
